import React, {Component} from "react"; import {variables} from "../Variables"; import {tsConstructorType} from '@babel/types' export class Muscle extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { muscles: [] } } refreshList(){ fetch(variables.MUSCLE_API_URL) .then(response => response.json()) .then(data => this.setState({muscles : data})) } componentDidMount() { this.refreshList(); } render() {

Muscle Page

const { muscles } = this.state const categoryConvert = ["Arms", "Back", "Core", "Legs" ] return (
{muscles.map(mus => )}
ID Name Category
{mus.Id} {mus.Name} {categoryConvert[mus.Category]}
) } }
